metadata.title: AI & Data Expertise
metadata.overview: Finding elite data and AI talent who also understand the nuances of financial services is a major challenge. This module explains how we provide rigorously vetted experts who can deliver value from day one, avoiding the long ramp-up times of generalist technical staff.

email.subject: The challenge of finding true data & AI experts
email.body:
Hi [Prospect Name],

How much time does your team lose onboarding technical staff who don't understand the complexities of the financial services industry? It's a common and costly problem.

Our Data & AI practice is built to solve this. We provide consultants who combine deep technical skill with proven financial services experience. They understand your world, from regulatory pressures to specific data security needs.

We recently placed a data architect with a wealth management firm who was contributing to high-level design decisions in her second week. Her domain knowledge allowed her to bypass the typical six-month learning curve.

Could your most critical projects benefit from that kind of immediate impact? If so, I'd welcome a brief 15-minute call to discuss your talent needs.

Best,
[Your Name]

key_message: I'm calling because we solve a very specific talent problem: finding data and AI experts who you don't have to spend six months teaching about financial services.
evidence_point: The last data architect we placed with a bank was so effective that the client told us she did more in her first month than the previous consultant did in six, simply because she already understood their business.
engagement_question: What's the biggest challenge you face when bringing on new technical talent for your data and AI projects?
voicemail: Hi [Prospect Name], it's [Your Name] from Eliassen Group.
If you've ever been frustrated by tech consultants who don't understand your business, give me a call.
We have the experts who do. My number is [phone number].

linkedin.connection_request: Hi [Prospect Name], I see we're both focused on building high-performing data & AI teams in the financial services space. I specialize in finding the talent with the right blend of tech and domain expertise, and would welcome a connection.
linkedin.inmessage_subject: Data & AI talent that gets it
linkedin.inmessage_body:
Hi [Prospect Name],

Finding people who are brilliant at data and AI is hard. Finding ones who also deeply understand financial services is even harder.

We specialize in finding that rare combination. The last data architect we placed with a bank made a major impact in her first month, saving them from a costly design flaw because she understood their specific regulatory constraints.

That's the value of true expertise. If you're looking for talent that can deliver value from day one, I'd be happy to have a brief chat.

Best,
[Your Name]

objections.objection: We use large staffing firms that we have preferred vendor agreements with.
objections.response: We understand, and we often work with clients who have those relationships. They come to us when they have a critical, high-stakes role where our specialized vetting process for financial services expertise makes all the difference in finding the right fit, faster.

objections.objection: Consultants with that level of specific experience are too expensive.
objections.response: It's a fair concern, but what's the cost of a six-month learning curve? Our clients find that the immediate productivity of our consultants provides a much faster return on investment. The total cost is often lower than a generalist who takes months to become effective.

objections.objection: We're looking to hire full-time employees, not bring on consultants.
objections.response: We support that goal, and many of our consulting engagements are designed as a 'try-before-you-buy' model. It allows you to see a consultant's impact firsthand. Over 70% of our clients who intend to hire full-time end up converting our consultant to a permanent role.

objections.objection: We have a strong internal recruiting team.
objections.response: That's a great asset. We partner with internal teams to help them fill their most challenging roles. They use us because our network is highly specialized in the intersection of data, AI, and financial services, which can be hard to penetrate with general recruiting methods.

collateral.title: Expertise Brief: Specialized Data & AI Talent for Financial Services
